name: Amlaiguri Satsang Vihar
history:
Sree Sree Thakur himself donated for the foundation of Srimandir.
Visited by Sree Sree Boroma with Sree Sree Borda on 22nd November 1969.
Inaugurated by Sree Sree Dada.
